abilities.name: Emotional Mastery
abilities.description: At the end of your turn, you may return a card from your hand to your deck to draw 2 cards

abilities.name: Diplomatic Resolution
abilities.description: When an enemy unit attacks this, both units are healed for 2 instead of dealing damage (once per turn)

body.raw:
# King of Cups

Master of emotional waters, balancing feelings with wisdom.

*"True power flows from emotional mastery."*
